visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: Use framer-motion or CSS keyframes to animate borders on active cards

instructions_to_main_agent.file_extension: Use .jsx for all React components. Do not use .tsx.
instructions_to_main_agent.styling_strategy: Use Tailwind CSS utility classes for 95% of styling. Use inline styles only for dynamic values (like progress bars).
instructions_to_main_agent.component_library: Customize the existing Shadcn components in /components/ui. Do not reinvent the wheel, but DO change their default styling to match the 'Cyber-Academia' aesthetic (darker backgrounds, glowing borders).
instructions_to_main_agent.charts: Use Recharts for analytics. Style them with the theme colors (Primary #8b5cf6, Secondary #10b981).
instructions_to_main_agent.animations: Add 'transition-all duration-300' to all interactive elements. Use simple CSS keyframes for 'pulse' or 'float' effects on the AI avatar.
instructions_to_main_agent.testing: MANDATORY: Add data-testid attributes to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards). Format: 'page-section-element-action' (e.g., 'login-form-submit-btn').

universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'Bootstrap' layouts. Use asymmetry where possible.
Never use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds; use #09090b or #0f172a.
Always provide visual feedback on hover and focus.
Ensure text contrast ratios meet WCAG AA standards, especially on dark backgrounds.
For the AI Tutor, create a dedicated 'Chat Interface' that feels like a conversation with a futuristic entity (use the AI Avatar image).
